dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation!
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 07, 2005 12:06 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Policy Enforcement
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation!


For your review.

Martin Gaston
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Begin forwarded message:

> From: "Ruslan Sabitov" <sabitov@credit-factor.com>
> Date: December 7, 2005 10:36:27 AM CST
> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
> Cc: admin@credit-factor.com
> Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation!
>
> Hello Sir/Madam,
>
>
>
> Credit Factor Corporation is the owner of the website: www.credit- 
> factor.com
>
> Recently we found that one of your customers (www.earthcredit.com) has 
> created a mirror of our website (www.credit-factor.com) and duplicated 
> the most pages from our website.
>
>
>
> We request to cease the activity of this website immediately.
>
> Thank you.
>
>
>
> I attached a screenshot of this website (www.earthcredit.com) and  
> registrant information below.
>
>
>
>
>
> Best regards,
>
> Ruslan Sabitov
>
> CEO
>
> Credit Factor Corporation
>
> 718-256-1811 ext. 110
>
> sabitov@credit-factor.com
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>   ----- www.earthcredit.com        Request Completed
>
